seo: openstack,nova,未可信站点,url重定向,开放重定向,漏洞
summary: 检测openstack-nova的console proxy（noVNC）是否存在开放重定向漏洞，该漏洞允许通过构造恶意URL重定向到任意站点。
summary_en: Detect whether there is an open redirection vulnerability in the console proxy (noVNC) of openstack-nova. This vulnerability allows redirection to any site through a crafted malicious URL.
